SPScript Docs
Class: Search

Search

new Search(dao)

Allows you to perform queries agains the SP Search Service. You shouldn't ever be new'ing this class up up yourself, instead you'll get it from your dao as shown in first example.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
dao IBaseDao Data access object used to make requests.
Source:
  • search.js, line 12
Example

You access this Search class using the 'search' property of the dao

var dao = new SPScript.RestDao(_spPageContextInfo.webAbsoluteUrl);
dao.search.query('andrew').then(function(result) { console.log(result.items) });

Methods

people(queryText, [queryOptions]opt) → {Promise.<SearchResults>}

Performs a query using the search service
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
queryText string The query text to send to the Search Service
[queryOptions] QueryOptions <optional>
 Override the default query options
Source:
  • search.js, line 126
Returns:
- A Promise that resolves to a SearchResults object
Type
Promise.<SearchResults>
Example
dao.search.people('andrew').then(function(result) { console.log(result.items) });
